properties.Name: FinancialStatement
properties.Description: Financial statements provide a format for the reporting of accounting information. The format and names of the required financial statements is different for each of the accounting frameworks.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementName
Columns.Description: The name of the Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementPreparationDate
Columns.Description: The date that the Financial Statement was prepared.

Columns.Name: AccountantsOpinionStatement
Columns.Description: A signed statement regarding the financial status of an entity from an independent public accountant after examination of that entities records and accounts.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement Type.
